attributes.action: Apply fuel duty for large super pleasure motor boats
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do 4x4 owners have to pay increased road tax along with fuel duty when many of them use there vehicles for work purposes/commuting and why do the super rich who own large motor boats pay no duty for filling there large tanks full of fuel. Many of these boats are using half a gallon a mile.
